verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H5358>Avenge<s%> <S%H5360><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> of the <S%H4084>Midianites:<s%> <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall you be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2502>Arm<s%> <S%H582>some<s%> of <S%H853>yourselves<s%> to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> and let them <S%H1961>go<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites,<s%> and <S%H5414>avenge<s%> <S%H5360><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>
Of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall you <S%H7971>send<s%> to the <S%H6635>war.<s%>

So there were <S%H4560>delivered<s%> out of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> them and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6635>war,<s%> with the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>instruments,<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> to <S%H8643>blow<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And they <S%H6633>warred<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4080>Midianites,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and they <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2145>males.<s%>

And they <S%H2026>slew<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> the rest of them that were <S%H2491>slain;<s%> namely, <S%H189>Evi,<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem,<s%> and <S%H6698>Zur,<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> and <S%H7254>Reba,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took all the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H7617>captives,<s%> and their <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and took the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of all their <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4735>flocks,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2428>goods.<s%>
And they <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%> wherein they <S%H4186>dwelled,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their goodly <S%H2918>castles,<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4455>prey,<s%> both of <S%H120>men<s%> and of <S%H929>beasts.<s%>

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7628>captives,<s%> and the <S%H4455>prey,<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with the <S%H6485>officers<s%> of the <S%H2428>host,<s%> with the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H6635>battle.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Have you <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5347>women<s%> <S%H2421>alive?<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> <S%H2007>these<s%> <S%H1961>caused<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> through the <S%H1697>counsel<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> to <S%H4560>commit<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> and there was a <S%H4046>plague<s%> among the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that has <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2145><s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with him.

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H2945>children,<s%> that have not <S%H3045>known<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2145><s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with him, keep <S%H2421>alive<s%> for yourselves.

And do you <S%H2583>abide<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> <S%H3605>whoever<s%> has <S%H2026>killed<s%> any <S%H5315>person,<s%> and <S%H3605>whoever<s%> has <S%H5060>touched<s%> any <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H2398>purify<s%> both yourselves and your <S%H7628>captives<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H2398>purify<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H899>raiment,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3627>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair, and <S%H3605>all<s%> things made of <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> which <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses;<s%>
<S%H389>Only<s%> the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> the <S%H5178>brass,<s%> the <S%H1270>iron,<s%> the <S%H913>tin,<s%> and the <S%H5777>lead,<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> that may <S%H935>abide<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you shall <S%H5674>make<s%> it <S%H5674>go<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2891>clean:<s%> <S%H389>nevertheless<s%> it shall be <S%H2398>purified<s%> with the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5079>separation:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H935>stays<s%> not the <S%H784>fire<s%> you shall <S%H5674>make<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> through the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and you shall be <S%H2891>clean,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5375>Take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H4455>prey<s%> that was <S%H7628>taken,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast,<s%> you, and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation:<s%>

And <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H4455>prey<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2673>two<s%> parts; <S%H996>between<s%> them that <S%H8610>took<s%> the <S%H4421>war<s%> on them, who <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H6635>battle,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation:<s%>

And <S%H7311>levy<s%> a <S%H4371>tribute<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> which <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H6635>battle:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> both of the <S%H120>persons,<s%> and of the <S%H1241>beeves,<s%> and of the <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and of the <S%H6629>sheep:<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> it of their <S%H4276>half,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> for an <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H4276>half,<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>portion<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> of the <S%H120>persons,<s%> of the <S%H1241>beeves,<s%> of the <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and of the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> which <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H4455>booty,<s%> being the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H957>prey<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H5971>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> had <S%H962>caught,<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%>
And three <S%H7657>score<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>beeves,<s%>
And three <S%H8346>score<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2543>asses,<s%>

And <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%> <S%H120><s%> in <S%H3605>all,<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%> that had not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with him.

And the <S%H4275>half,<s%> which was the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of them that <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H6635>war,<s%> was in <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep:<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4371>tribute<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and three <S%H7657>score<s%> and <S%H7657>fifteen.<s%>

And the <S%H1241>beeves<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%> of which the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was three <S%H7657>score<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve.<s%>

And the <S%H2543>asses<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred;<s%> of which the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was three <S%H8346>score<s%> and <S%H259>one.<s%>

And the <S%H5315>persons<s%> <S%H120><s%> were <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand;<s%> of which the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5315>persons.<s%> <S%H120><s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4371>tribute,<s%> which was the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H8641>offering,<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H4276>half,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2673>divided<s%> from the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H6633>warred,<s%>

(Now the <S%H4275>half<s%> that pertained to the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%>
And <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>beeves,<s%>
And <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%>
And <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons;<s%> <S%H120><s%>)

Even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H4276>half,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>portion<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> which <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H6485>officers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were over <S%H505>thousands<s%> of the <S%H6635>host,<s%> the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses:<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5375>taken<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are under our <S%H3027>charge,<s%> and there <S%H6485>lacks<s%> not one <S%H376>man<s%> of us.

We have therefore <S%H7126>brought<s%> an <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H4672>gotten,<s%> of <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H685>chains,<s%> and <S%H6781>bracelets,<s%> <S%H2885>rings,<s%> <S%H5694>earrings,<s%> and <S%H3558>tablets,<s%> to <S%H5674>make<s%> an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for our <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of them, even <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4639>worked<s%> <S%H3627>jewels.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8641>offering<s%> that they <S%H7311>offered<s%> up to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> was <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>
(For the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> had taken <S%H962>spoil,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> for himself.)

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
